item.description:
Never been the Wedeln Ski house? Interested in finding out more about the club and/or becoming a member? Stay at our house for the discount rate on $10* a night for "New Guest Weekend".

Schedule:

• Arrive Friday night anytime after 8:30PM. Wine and Fondue Welcome Reception and house tour
• Saturday: Day Hike or Ski or attend ULLR festival
• Saturday evening: Social Event
• Sunday: for those interested we will plan a short hike.

Meals: Not included. More details about meals to follow.

Overnight Accommodations:
There are 21 bedrooms, dorm style and separated by gender.
Bring your own sheets, blanket, pillow. A sleeping bag and pillow work well too.
Bring toiletries, etc.

• Saturday evening: Social Event Cost: $10

Yes RSVP's will get directions to the Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club. Maybe RSVP will be allowed for now but will eventually be changed to No.

*Great news! Everyone pays $10 per night!It can't get any cheaper!

There are no refunds.

Please let me know if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,
Jonathan
item.name: New Guest Weekend @ Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club
